channel.title: Posts on Sneha Mayya
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Sneha Mayya

item.title: Changes
item.description: hey there… again. So whoever is reading this (idk if peeps are really doing so but whatevz), i may or may not have, you know, forgot about my blog so… OOPS! uhm so this post is a straightforward one, i aint gonna go ahead and change my grammer or spelling, this is just gonna say this, Im quitting ghosts, the story. I have classes coming up so yeah… however, I will not be QUITTING the site, i will post… stuff.

item.title: Chapter 1: Terrified
item.description: “Welcome to Real-imination Tower, here is lovely Los Angeles, California! Real-imination Tower is based off of a game from the famous one and only platform for gaming- Roblox!! I will be the main host for today!” host Duce Brapples exclaimed into his mic. “Today’s competitor is put to the test to complete 5 dangerous stages in the tower and be examined by a pro at this tower, a gamer who has played this before and has died multiple times and respawned!

item.title: Sorry!
item.description: Hey guys, I’m back and sorry for the inconvenience but I will be posting weekly now cause there is too much to write in one day so yeah. Now, Chapter One, pt 2 of Ghosts will be postponed until next Monday! C’ya! Sorry bout this! (Part 1 WILL come out today!)

item.title: Ghosts - Introduction
item.description: Hi again and welcome back to day 2 of this blog! After some thinking, I decided to start off with something I’ve longed to write about for quite a long time now. So let’s hop in and start reading! Let’s start off with a bit of info about me! I play Roblox, an online gaming platform and I highly enjoy it. Call me weird or cheezy but hey! It’s what I enjoy!

item.title: Hello
item.description: Hi my name is Sneha! This is my brand new blog where I plan on posting… stuff? I haven’t exactly planned everything out but… hey! The future is later, not now! Anywho, I might write some stories and stuff so yea! Keep on the lookout! I will post everyday… or least I’m planning to! Well, this is all for the opening of my brand new blog site! Now buckle up and enjoy!
